casebody.data:
EHMANN, et al.
v.
MEDFLOW, INC., et al. 433A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 12, 2018 Matthew N. Leerberg, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Medflow, Inc., et al. Harold C. Spears, Attorney at Law, Christopher P. Raab, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Ehmann, Eugene K., et al.

Amended

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of February 2018 by Defendants for Extension of Time to Respond to Petition for Writ of Certiorari: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th of February 2018." Defendants shall have up to and including the 15th of March 2018 to Respond to Petition for Writ of Certiorari. Jackson, J. recused.
